name: Path of Trials
description:
Welcome to the world of Path of Trials! This is an exciting platformer with two captivating modes: Story and World.
In Story mode, you'll embark on thrilling adventures as a cat who aspires to reach the heavens and rescue their faithful friend. Playing in Story mode, you will uncover diaries that will reveal an exciting tale of friendship. Immerse yourself in the world of adventures and help our cat achieve their goal.


The World mode features an open world with various challenges. By completing them, you'll discover crystals and unlock new skins for your character. Explore this world, achieve your objectives, and become a true master of Path of Trials!


Gameplay:
- Reach the Summit, But Beware Of Falls!
Your main goal is to reach the summit, but remember that even the slightest mistake can send you plummeting down!

- Mastery Of Jumps For victory!
You have the ability to control the height of your jumps. Simply hold the button to jump higher. At the bottom of the screen, you'll see a progress bar that will help you determine how high you're about to jump. Precise mastery will lead you to victory!

- Plan Every Jump!
Before making a jump, carefully assess your position and the spot you intend to jump to. Planning and strategy are your keys to success. Choose your path wisely!
